descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Andre Drummond comes up on an easy two-handed dunk after Anthony Davis gets by his defender and finds him with a nice pass under the basket.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (AD's slick pass sets up Drummond dunk) 2021/05/11 ESHEET

videos.headline: AD's slick pass sets up Drummond dunk

videos.description: Anthony Davis throws up an and-1 circus shot and Andrew Drummond rebounds the miss at the line for a lay-in.
videos.headline: Lakers pull off 4-point possession

videos.description: Julius Randle backs up for the big shot on Kentavious Caldwell-Pope.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Randle puts up tough shot vs. former team ) 2021/5/11 ESHEET

videos.headline: Randle puts up tough shot vs. former team

videos.description: Derrick Rose beats his defender in the lane for the clutch layup.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Rose with the big shot for the Knicks) 2021/5/11 ESHEET

videos.headline: Rose with the big shot for the Knicks

videos.description: Wesley Matthews ties things up with a contested layup and Julius Randle can't match him as the Knicks-Lakers head to overtime.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Randle can’t match Matthews as we head to OT ) 2021/5/11 ESHEET

videos.headline: Randle can't match Matthews as we head to OT

videos.description: Anthony Davis is having trouble hearing Spike Lee after the Lakers defeat the Knicks in overtime.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (AD taunts Spike Lee after the Lakers' OT win) 2021/5/11 ESHEET

videos.headline: AD taunts Spike Lee after the Lakers' OT win
